metadata.title: CVE-2021-39579 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in swftools through 20200710. Aheap-buffer-overflow exists in the function string_hash() located in q.c.It allows an attacker to cause code Execution.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
